meanings.definition: (histology) An embryonic cell that develops into the dermal layer of the skin.
meanings.english_definition: An embryonic cell that develops into the dermal layer of the skin.

examples.sentence: The dermoblast differentiates into fibroblasts and other cells of the dermis.
examples.translation: 皮膚芽細胞は、線維芽細胞や真皮の他の細胞に分化する。
